content:
@Julian Berman @Arthur Paulino

Sorry for the sudden mention.

I have contributed to metaprogramming bookin the past (rewrite for mdbook), but realised that I had made a serious mistake. I opened a PR to correct that mistake.

Please review https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4-metaprogramming-book/pull/137
That's about pdf generation right? I think @Julian Berman has more context here

Yes. The src directory of the mdbook has been changed. The code for generating pdfs had to be changed accordingly.

I have confirmed that there seems to be no problem with the generation of pdfs. See the GitHub Action summary for the artifact.
I'm on vacation for the week so essentially offline, but made a note to look when I'm back (feel free to remind me if I don't do so by next week).
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
